content:
I got ahead of myself there! Well, in that case, you have a lot to look forward to! Olivia Colman's portrayal of Queen Elizabeth II is fantastic, and she brings a new level of depth and nuance to the character.

You'll get to see her in Seasons 3 and 4 of The Crown, and I think you'll really enjoy her performance. She's a highly acclaimed actress, and she brings a lot of subtlety and complexity to the role of the Queen.

But for now, I'm excited for you to start watching Victoria and seeing Jenna Coleman's portrayal of Queen Victoria! Let me know what you think of it once you've started watching!
